page.title: 02The Shops in Warcop
page.content: There are three shops in our block. They are called Spar which is owned by Mr and Mrs Gregson,Post Office run by Mrs Parr,and Mrs Middleton's. Spar sells groceries,cards,hardware,beer, wines,spirits ,tobacco and cigarettes. The Post Office also sells sweets, tobacco,newspapers,cards and gifts. Middletons sell groceries,hardware and tobacco.The Post Office is the busiest shop in the village although the Spar is used a lot.The average number of people that visit the Post Office in one hour is 8; the Spar, 6; and Mrs Middleton's, 3.The Gregson family have been running the Spar for 150 years.The Post Office has 4 assistants the Spar has 5 assistants and Mrs Middleton works on her own.
